definitions.definition: Nerium oleander , a notoriously poisonous shrub in the dogbane family, Apocynaceae , but nonetheless widely grown as an ornamental, having leathery lance-shaped leaves and deep rose-colored or white flowers.

main_definition: Nerium oleander , a notoriously poisonous shrub in the dogbane family, Apocynaceae , but nonetheless widely grown as an ornamental, having leathery lance-shaped leaves and deep rose-colored or white flowers.
